CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_agency_access_authorization AS SELECT a.id, p.name AS product, ptr.name AS product_relationship, r.name AS relationship, rsc.name AS agency, ctr.name AS agency_relationship FROM ruleform.access_authorization a JOIN ruleform.product p ON a.product1 = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ptr ON a.parent_transitive_relationship = ptr.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r ON a.relationship = r.id JOIN ruleform.agency rsc ON a.agency2 = rsc.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ctr ON a.child_transitive_relationship = ctr.id WHERE a.authorization_type = '2Â®';
ALTER TABLE readable.product_agency_access_authorization OWNER TO core;
